original_text: When you say that, the leaders of the Israelites will listen to you. Then you must go with them to the king of Egypt. Say to him, “The Lord God has met with us. He is the God that we, the Israelite people, worship. So let us go on a journey into the wilderness. That will be a journey of three days. We must offer sacrifices to the Lord our God there.”
korean_text: 그들이 네 말을 들으리니 너는 그들의 장로들과 함께 애굽 왕에게 이르기를 히브리 사람의 하나님 여호와께서 우리에게 임하셨은즉 우리가 우리 하나님 여호와께 제사를 드리려 하오니 사흘길쯤 광야로 가도록 허락하소서 하라

sentences.original_text: the leaders of the Israelites will listen to you
Then you must go with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그들과 함께 가야 한다

sentences.original_text: The Lord God has met with us
that we, the Israelite people, worship
So let us go on a journey
That will be a journey of three days
We must offer sacrifices to the Lord our God there
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 거기서 우리 주 하나님께 제물을 바쳐야 한다
